title: What's Cooking/Que se cocina en Puerto Rico
description: The recipes in this bilingual cookbook reflect the kitchens of the island's multi-national residents and its wonderful restaurants.Friends and members of Temple Beth Shalom have contributed recipes that were created in each of their homelands, and adapted to fit their Caribbean present. Represented are the foods of Puerto Rico, the United States, Israel, Cuba, Australia, Switzerland, Germany, Russia, Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey and Mexico.Whether you're looking for an appetizer or entr√©e or dessert, you can find a selection - in both English and Spanish - within the sections of this cookbook.
author: Barbara Tasch Ezratty
